item.title: Data Beyond Vision
item.description: How do we share tangible objects in a visual medium? We present, describe, use words, pictures, diagrams, show … fail.

item.title: The Body As Data
item.description: When I was growing up I liked to read about dying children. I’m not talking about the Victorian orphan kind of dying either, not the dying of storybooks, but children (well, teenagers) who were terminally ill.
